info.title: Avi VIMgrHostRuntime Object API
info.description:
CLI
```
- show vinfra host <key>
- vinfra makehostaccessible  <key>
- show vinfra quarantinedhost
```

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: object name

parameters.name: refers_to
parameters.description: Filter to request all objects that refers to another Avi resource. Its syntax is refers_to=<obj_type>:<obj_uuid>. Eg. get all virtual services referring to pool p1 will be refers_to=pool:pool_p1_uuid

parameters.name: referred_by
parameters.description: Filter to request all objects that are referred by another Avi resource. Its syntax is referred_by=<obj_type>:<obj_uuid>. Eg. get all pools referred_by virtual service vs1 - referred_by=virtualservice:vs_vs1_uuid

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: List of fields to be returned for the resource. Some fields like name, URL, uuid etc. are always returned.

parameters.name: include_name
parameters.description: All the Avi REST reference URIs have a name suffix as URI#name. It is useful to get the referenced resource name without performing get on that object.

parameters.name: skip_default
parameters.description: Default values are not set.

parameters.name: join_subresources
parameters.description: It automatically returns additional dependent resources like runtime. Eg. join_subresources=runtime.

parameters.name: X-Avi-Tenant
parameters.description: Avi Tenant Header

parameters.name: X-Avi-Tenant-UUID
parameters.description: Avi Tenant Header UUID

parameters.name: X-Avi-Version
parameters.description: The caller is required to set Avi Version Header to the expected version of configuration. The response from the controller will provide and accept data according to the specified version. The controller will reject POST and PUT requests where the data is not compatible with the specified version.

parameters.name: X-CSRFToken
parameters.description: Avi Controller may send back CSRF token in the response cookies. The caller should update the request headers with this token else controller will reject requests.

parameters.name: cloud_uuid
parameters.description: Filter to get objects that belongs to a specific cloud using its uuid. Eg. cloud_uuid=cloud-xyz.

parameters.name: cloud_ref.name
parameters.description: Filter to get objects that belongs to a specific cloud usings its name. This uses cloud name rather than uuid. Eg. cloud_ref.name=Default-Cloud.

parameters.name: cloud_ref.uuid
parameters.description: Filter to get objects that belongs to a specific cloud using its uuid. Eg. cloud_ref.uuid=cloud_uuid.

parameters.name: name.contains
parameters.description: Filter to get objects with name that contains the parameter. This is a case sensitive search. Eg. name.contains=pool-.

parameters.name: name.icontains
parameters.description: Filter to get objects with name that contains the parameter. This is a case insensitive search. Eg. name.icontains=pool-.

parameters.name: name.in
parameters.description: Filter to get objects that have a uuid matching any of the values in the parameter list. Each value for this parameter is to comma separated. Eg. name.in=pool-1,pool-12.

parameters.name: uuid.in
parameters.description: Filter to get objects that have a uuid matching any of the values in the parameter list. Each value for this parameter is to comma separated. Eg. uuid.in=<uuid-1>,<uuid-2>.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Filter to get objects that contains the search string as value for any of its fields. Eg. search=LEAST_CONN. The search filter can also be used to search under a specific field. This is achieved by sending the parameter as ?search=(<field>,<value>)|(<field>,<value>). Eg. search=(name,vs-pool-).

parameters.name: isearch
parameters.description: Filter to get objects that contains case insensitive search string. Eg. isearch=(name,Vs-Pool-).

parameters.name: limit_by
parameters.description: Filter to limit the number of objects in the response data. Eg. limit_by=3.

parameters.name: exclude
parameters.description: Filter to exclude the uuid(s) contained in the parameter. Eg. uuid.in=<uuid-1>,<uuid-2>&exclude=uuid.in.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Parameter to sort the results with respect to a field. Eg. sort=name.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Parameter to specify the maximum number of results to be returned per page. The page_size can range from 1 to 200. Eg. page_size=5.

parameters.name: X-Avi-Tenant
parameters.description: Avi Tenant Header

parameters.name: X-Avi-Tenant-UUID
parameters.description: Avi Tenant Header UUID

parameters.name: X-Avi-Version
parameters.description: The caller is required to set Avi Version Header to the expected version of configuration. The response from the controller will provide and accept data according to the specified version. The controller will reject POST and PUT requests where the data is not compatible with the specified version.

parameters.name: X-CSRFToken
parameters.description: Avi Controller may send back CSRF token in the response cookies. The caller should update the request headers with this token else controller will reject requests.

chassis.description: Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials, Basic, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

system_name.description: Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials, Basic, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

cloud_uuid.description: Vcenter cloud id. Field introduced in 22.1.3. Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

_last_modified.description: UNIX time since epoch in microseconds. Units(MICROSECONDS).

cloud_ref.description: It is a reference to an object of type Cloud. Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials, Basic, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

cluster_name.description: Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials, Basic, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

cluster_uuid.description: Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials, Basic, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

cntlr_accessible.description: Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials, Basic, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

managed_object_id.description: Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials, Basic, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

mem.description: Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials, Basic, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

mgmt_portgroup.description: Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials, Basic, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

name.description: Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials, Basic, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

num_cpu_packages.description: Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials, Basic, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

num_cpu_threads.description: Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials, Basic, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

pnics.description: Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials, Basic, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

powerstate.description: Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials, Basic, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

quarantined.description: Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials, Basic, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

quarantined_periods.description: Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials, Basic, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

se_fail_cnt.description: Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials, Basic, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

se_success_cnt.description: Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials, Basic, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

type.description: Enum options - CLOUD_NONE, CLOUD_VCENTER, CLOUD_OPENSTACK, CLOUD_AWS, CLOUD_VCA, CLOUD_APIC, CLOUD_MESOS, CLOUD_LINUXSERVER, CLOUD_DOCKER_UCP, CLOUD_RANCHER, CLOUD_OSHIFT_K8S, CLOUD_AZURE, CLOUD_GCP, CLOUD_NSXT. Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials, Basic, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

uuid.description: Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials, Basic, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

vm_refs.description: It is a reference to an object of type VIMgrVMRuntime. Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials, Basic, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.
